page.title: 07Tourism- Caravans & Camping
page.content: Tourism plays a very important part in Silloth.Silloth was meant to be a busy port to serve Carlisle, and was also planned to become a holiday town.Self_ catering holidays bring many people to Silloth in the summer. The two largest caravan parks are{Stanwix Park}and{The {Solway Lido.} Stanwix Park was first established in West Silloth in 1937 by{ Mr. Hilton {Stanwix}on part of his farm. When he died his two sons{Roland}and{Eric}took it on. People took their own caravans and put them in their fields. The sons started to develop the site beginning with a paddling pool and swings. Now they have an open - air swimming pool with a sunbathing balcony, pony rides, crazy golf,windsurfing,tandems, BMX's, putting green and play area with slide swings, roundabout etc. There are 28 apartments and 200 caravans.{Cont'd.
